description: Returns a paginated list of all policies stored in the specified policy store.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store you want to list policies from.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specifies the total number of results that you want included in each response. If additional items exist beyond the number you specify, the NextToken response element is returned with a value (not null). Include the specified value as the NextToken request parameter in the next call to the operation to get the next set of results. Note that the service might return fewer results than the maximum even when there are more results available. You should check NextToken after every operation to ensure that you receive all of the results. If you do not specify this parameter, the operation defaults to 10 policies per response. You can specify a maximum of 50 policies per response.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specifies a filter that limits the response to only policies that match the specified criteria. For example, you list only the policies that reference a specified principal. principal (dict) --- Filters the output to only policies that reference the specified principal. unspecified (boolean) --- Used to indicate that a principal or resource is not specified. This can be used to search for policies that are not associated with a specific principal or resource. identifier (dict) --- The identifier of the entity. It can consist of either an EntityType and EntityId, a principal, or a resource. The type of an entity. Example: "entityType":"typeName" The identifier of an entity. "entityId":"identifier" resource (dict) --- Filters the output to only policies that reference the specified resource. "entityId":"identifier" policyType (string) --- Filters the output to only policies of the specified type. policyTemplateId (string) --- Filters the output to only template-linked policies that were instantiated from the specified policy template.

nested_params.name: principal
nested_params.description: Filters the output to only policies that reference the specified principal.

nested_params.name: unspecified
nested_params.description: Used to indicate that a principal or resource is not specified. This can be used to search for policies that are not associated with a specific principal or resource.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the entity. It can consist of either an EntityType and EntityId, a principal, or a resource.

nested_params.name: entityType
nested_params.description: The type of an entity. Example: "entityType":"typeName"

nested_params.name: resource
nested_params.description: Filters the output to only policies that reference the specified resource.

nested_params.name: unspecified
nested_params.description: Used to indicate that a principal or resource is not specified. This can be used to search for policies that are not associated with a specific principal or resource.

nested_params.name: identifier
nested_params.description: The identifier of the entity. It can consist of either an EntityType and EntityId, a principal, or a resource.

nested_params.name: entityType
nested_params.description: The type of an entity. Example: "entityType":"typeName"

nested_params.name: policyType
nested_params.description: Filters the output to only policies of the specified type.

nested_params.name: policyTemplateId
nested_params.description: Filters the output to only template-linked policies that were instantiated from the specified policy template.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.

nested_items.name: policies
nested_items.description: Lists all policies that are available in the specified policy store.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the policy store where the policy you want information about is stored.

nested_items.name: policyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the policy you want information about.

nested_items.name: policyType
nested_items.description: The type of the policy. This is one of the following values:
STATIC.
TEMPLATE_LINKED.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal associated with the policy.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: actions
nested_items.description: The action that a policy permits or forbids. For example, {"actions": [{"actionId": "ViewPhoto", "actionType": "PhotoFlash::Action"}, {"entityID": "SharePhoto", "entityType": "PhotoFlash::Action"}]}.

nested_items.name: actionType
nested_items.description: The type of an action.

nested_items.name: actionId
nested_items.description: The ID of an action.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: The policy definition of an item in the list of policies returned.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the static policy.

nested_items.name: templateLinked
nested_items.description: Information about a template-linked policy that was created by instantiating a policy template.

nested_items.name: policyTemplateId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the policy template used to create this policy.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal associated with this template-linked policy. Verified Permissions substitutes this principal for the ?principal placeholder in the policy template when it evaluates an authorization request.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the policy was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the policy was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: effect
nested_items.description: The effect of the decision that a policy returns to an authorization request. For example, "effect": "Permit".
